thread.section_title: Hotel Orlanda - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great as last time
thread.title_full: Great as last time - Review of Hotel Orlanda, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: LLL825
title: Great as last time
text: The hotel is extremely conveniently situated near Termini station, literally 5 minutes on foot. The windows work wonderfully in isolating from noise, so it is very quiet at night despite being so central. Bed comfortable, rooms very clean, wifi efficient. Very corteous staff, pleasant breakfast, and free coffee and croissants in the afternoon. If you want a good dinner, just going down to the Elettra restaurant below will do the trick.
